name: 陳錦文
objective:
本課程目的在讓學生系統性理解複合材料的基本概念與結構組成，從基體與補強材的材料選擇與功能設計，進一步掌握奈米與功能性複材、紡織增強複材及智慧穿戴應用等前瞻議題；並透過各類加工方法與未來趨勢的探討，結合理論學習與實務應用，培養學生具備分析、設計與評估複合材料系統的能力，最終能於期末簡報中展現整合所學之能力。
This course aims to provide students with a systematic understanding of the fundamental concepts and structural composition of composite materials. It covers the selection and functional design of matrix and reinforcement materials, and further explores advanced topics such as nanocomposites, functional composites, textile-reinforced composites, and smart wearable applications. Through the integration of various processing techniques and discussions on future trends, the course bridges theoretical knowledge with practical application. It is designed to cultivate students' abilities in analyzing, designing, and evaluating composite material systems, ultimately enabling them to demonstrate their integrated learning outcomes through a comprehensive final presentation.
schedule:
W1: Introduction to Composite Materials
W2-3: Matrix Materials
W4-5: Reinforced Materials

W11: Min-term Exam
W12: Nanocomposite Materials
W13: Smart Textiles and Wearable Composite Application
W14: Future Trend of Composite Materials
W15-18: Final Presentation
